author: Thanosvbest
title: Hermione granger
review:
The Hermione Granger figure from Harry Potter minifigure series 2 is overall about 3 of 5 for me due to some new pieces, however there could have been a more interesting variants.

The figure in general is not bad with dual moulded legs with side leg printing as well. The torso has a pattern on which is accurate to the scene from the half blood prince film. The face is not much different to the Hermiones in the sets but is exclusive and the hair is used in other sets from the 3rd film to the 6th one.

Her accessories is a new butter beer piece which was exclusive to her and the Ron figure until it was used in hogsmeade village and the dark tan wand. The stand is the normal stand from most CMFs.

However, this figure lacks points because there could be a more interesting variant like one from the deathly hallows.

Overall I would say this figure is a good figure but, not one of the best from the series so if you were to get one of the figures I would say try to find a more interesting one.
